hints.label: thm-bh-ads-schwarzschild
hints.title: AdS-Schwarzschild from Fragile Gas
hints.content:
3723: :label: thm-bh-ads-schwarzschild
3724: 
3725: Consider a Fragile Gas with:
3726: 
3727: **1. Deep fitness minimum**: $V_{\text{fit}} = -GM/(c^2 r)$ at $x_{\text{BH}}$
3728: 
3729: **2. Holographic boundary**: Spatial horizon at radius $L \gg r_S$
3730: 
3731: **3. IG pressure**: Negative pressure $\Pi_{\text{IG}} < 0$ from short-range correlations
3732: 
3733: Then the emergent geometry is **AdS-Schwarzschild**:
3734: 
3735: $$
3736: ds^2 = -f(r) c^2 dt^2 + f(r)^{-1} dr^2 + r^2 d\Omega^2
3737: 
3738: $$
3739: 
3740: where:
3741: 
3742: $$
3743: f(r) = 1 - \frac{2GM}{c^2 r} - \frac{r^2}{L_{\text{AdS}}^2}
3744: 
3745: $$
3746: 
3747: The term $-r^2/L_{\text{AdS}}^2$ is the **AdS cosmological constant** contribution.
3748: 
3749: **Hawking-Page Transition**:
3750: As temperature varies, the system undergoes a **phase transition**:
3751: - **Low $T$**: Thermal AdS (no black hole, CFT is unconfined)
3752: - **High $T$**: AdS-Schwarzschild black hole (CFT is deconfined, thermal plasma)
3753: 
3754: The transition temperature is:
3755: 
3756: $$
3757: T_{\text{HP}} = \frac{\hbar c}{2\pi k_B L_{\text{AdS}}}

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-45
hints.content:
3762: :::{prf:proof}
3763: 
3764: **Step 1: Holographic boundary AdS**
3765: 
3766: From {prf:ref}`thm-boundary-always-ads` ({doc}`../13_fractal_set_new/12_holography`), the holographic vacuum at the boundary is:
3767: 
3768: $$
3769: \Lambda_{\text{holo}} = \frac{8\pi G_N}{c^2}\frac{\Pi_{\text{IG}}}{L} < 0
3770: 
3771: $$
3772: 
3773: This gives an **effective AdS radius**:
3774: 
3775: $$
3776: L_{\text{AdS}}^2 = -\frac{3c^2}{8\pi G_N \Lambda_{\text{holo}}}
3777: 
3778: $$
3779: 
3780: **Step 2: Black hole in AdS bulk**
3781: 
3782: The bulk spacetime (interior to the holographic boundary) contains a Schwarzschild black hole. The full metric combines:
3783: - Schwarzschild term: $-2GM/(c^2 r)$ (black hole)
3784: - AdS term: $-r^2/L_{\text{AdS}}^2$ (negative cosmological constant)
3785: 
3786: Resulting in:
3787: 
3788: $$
3789: f(r) = 1 - \frac{2GM}{c^2 r} - \frac{r^2}{L_{\text{AdS}}^2}
3790: 
3791: $$
3792: 
3793: **Step 3: Hawking-Page transition from free energy**
3794: 
3795: The free energy of the two phases are:
3796: 
3797: **Thermal AdS** (no black hole):
3798: 
3799: $$
3800: F_{\text{AdS}} = -\frac{\pi^2 k_B^4 T^4}{90\hbar^3 c^3} \cdot V_{\text{AdS}}
3801: 
3802: $$
3803: 
3804: where $V_{\text{AdS}} \sim L_{\text{AdS}}^3$ is the AdS volume.
3805: 
3806: **AdS-Schwarzschild black hole**:
3807: 
3808: $$
3809: F_{\text{BH}} = M - T S = M - T \frac{A_H}{4G_N}
3810: 
3811: $$
3812: 
3813: where $A_H = 4\pi r_+^2$ and $r_+$ is the outer horizon radius (root of $f(r) = 0$).
3814: 
3815: The transition occurs when $F_{\text{AdS}} = F_{\text{BH}}$, giving $T_{\text{HP}} \sim \hbar c/(k_B L_{\text{AdS}})$.

hints.label: thm-bh-cft-entropy
hints.title: Black Hole Entropy = CFT Entropy
hints.content:
3823: :label: thm-bh-cft-entropy
3824: 
3825: **Claim**: The Bekenstein-Hawking entropy of an AdS-Schwarzschild black hole equals the thermal entropy of the dual boundary CFT.
3826: 
3827: **Proof**:
3828: 
3829: From {prf:ref}`thm-holographic-main` ({doc}`../13_fractal_set_new/12_holography`), the IG entropy on the boundary equals the CST area in the bulk:
3830: 
3831: $$
3832: S_{\text{IG}} = \frac{A_{\text{CST}}}{4G_N}
3833: 
3834: $$
3835: 
3836: For a black hole, the CST area is the horizon area $A_H$, so:
3837: 
3838: $$
3839: S_{\text{BH}} = \frac{A_H}{4G_N}
3840: 
3841: $$
3842: 
3843: The boundary CFT at finite temperature $T = T_H$ has thermal entropy:
3844: 
3845: $$
3846: S_{\text{CFT}} = \frac{\partial F_{\text{CFT}}}{\partial T}
3847: 
3848: $$
3849: 
3850: where $F_{\text{CFT}}$ is the CFT free energy (computed via holographic renormalization).
3851: 
3852: By AdS/CFT duality, the CFT partition function equals the bulk gravitational partition function:
3853: 
3854: $$
3855: Z_{\text{CFT}}(T) = Z_{\text{grav}}(T) = \int \mathcal{D}g \, e^{-S_{\text{Einstein}}[g]/\hbar}
3856: 
3857: $$
3858: 
3859: For AdS-Schwarzschild, the dominant saddle point is the black hole geometry, giving:
3860: 
3861: $$
3862: S_{\text{CFT}} = S_{\text{BH}} = \frac{A_H}{4G_N}
3863: 
3864: $$

hints.label: thm-bh-formation-ig-pressure
hints.title: Black Hole Formation from IG Pressure
hints.content:
3872: :label: thm-bh-formation-ig-pressure
3873: 
3874: A black hole forms when the **IG surface tension** overcomes the **thermal pressure**:
3875: 
3876: $$
3877: |\Pi_{\text{IG}}| > P_{\text{thermal}} = \frac{k_B T \rho}{m}
3878: 
3879: $$
3880: 
3881: At the critical density $\rho_{\text{crit}}$, the system collapses into a black hole.
3882: 
3883: **Physical Interpretation**: The IG network acts like an **elastic membrane** pulling inward (negative pressure). When the inward pull exceeds the outward thermal pressure, gravitational collapse occurs.
